person.description: The English guy. His favourite things include: code (duh!), the word lovely, coffee, tea, awesome code written by other people and anything Apple. He is currently studying maths with the open university and occasionally writes on his blog. It is his dream to have Railslove sponsored by Swiss Choco Bits. Red established his company RiotHQ in the beginning of 2011
person.meta_title: Red Davis - Ruby on Rails developer
